comprehensive_overview: vcf2tsvpy is a Python library for converting Variant Call Format (VCF) files into tab-separated values (TSV) files. It facilitates the conversion of genetic variant data stored in VCF format into a more easily accessible and analyzable TSV format.
core_features: Conversion of VCF files to TSV format
Support for genetic variant data processing
Written in Python for ease of use and integration in Python workflows
